Action.Subject: Invitation
Action.search: //input[@role='combobox' and @placeholder='Find messages, documents, photos or people']
Action.RestoreToInbox: //button[@type='button' and @aria-label='Restore selected messages to Inbox'] | //button[@data-test-id='toolbar-archive-restore' and @title='Restore selected messages to Inbox'] |//button[@type='button' and @data-test-id='toolbar-archive-restore']|//button[@type='button' and @aria-label='Restore selected conversations to Inbox']
Action.move: //button[@type='button' and @data-test-id='folder-menu-button']|//button[@aria-label='Move the selected conversations to another folder' and @title='Move the selected conversations to another folder']
Action.delete: //button[@type='button' and @data-test-id='toolbar-perm-delete'] | //button[@type='button' and @aria-label='Permanently delete the selected messages'] | //button[@type='button' and @title='Permanently delete the selected messages'] | //button[@type='button' and @data-test-id='toolbar-delete' ] | //button[@type='button' and @title='Delete the selected messages']
Action.Reply1:
Dear ,
 Thank you for contacting me. I appreciate your interest and I am happy to help. In order to better understand your request, could you please provide more information about PRODUCT? 
 This will help me provide a more accurate response and better assist you. Thank you in advance for your help.
 Thank you.
Action.Reply2:
Dear, 
 Thank you for your message. I am interested in your proposal, but I need some clarification on specific issue or point. 
 Could you please provide more details or examples to help me better understand? This will allow me to provide a more accurate response and move forward with the next steps.
 Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
 Best regards,
Action.Reply3:
Dear, 
 Thank you for your email. I am interested in the opportunity/issue you mentioned, but in order to proceed, I need to review. 
 Could you please provide me with documents or information? This will allow me to better understand the situation and move forward accordingly. 
 Thank you in advance for your help. I look forward to hearing back from you soon. 
 Best regards!
Action.Reply4:
Dear, 
 Thank you for your email. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate the update/inquiry and will respond as soon as possible. 
 Best regards
Action.Reply5:
Dear, 
 Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in the opportunity/issue you mentioned, but I need some more information before I can proceed. Could you please provide more details about specific information needed? 
 Thank you!!
Action.Reply6:
Dear, 
 Thank you for your email. It would be great to discuss this matter further in a meeting. Are you available for a call/zoom meeting on specific date and time? 
 Please let me know your availability. 
 Thanks!
